text: If a client buys a theme from the marketplace and that theme is then updated, do they get the updates automatically or do they have to redownload the pack somehow?
Hey <@U2H3TT8F2>. Updates do not get installed automatically (in case there's any functionality that would break or affect the live site we don't want to install that automatically)
That said, if you head to Content > Marketplace and go to the Purchased tab. Then click on a template at the bottom you'll see a notification if it's up to date, or out of date.

<@U22PU4G4A|jvocell> uploaded a file: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/files/jvocell/F5A71RMU6/screen_shot_2017-05-05_at_12.49.16_pm.png|Screen Shot 2017-05-05 at 12.49.16 PM.png> and commented: Like in the lower-right here...
